name: The Thief & The Muse Lite v1.0
name_original: The Thief & The Muse Lite v1.0
description:
Diamond City was once a prosperous and peaceful land. The Sages could use the power of the elements to create sustenance for themselves and others. However, a corrupt militia tried to forcefully take this power. They went to war with The Sages and their 7 wise leaders, the unRealistics. 

And in a few short years, Diamond City was nearly destroyed; its special and mysterious history long forgotten. The militia, known as The Soldiers ruled Diamond City and brought it into a future where they controlled power, weapons, and technology while the civilians barely struggled to survive. 

The unRealistics disappeared, leaving magical diamonds in their absence; scattered all across the city. It was said that whoever collected all of the unRealistic Diamonds would gain unimaginable power. But they were never found, and they too were forgotten.    

Years later, a group of bandits known as The Sneaks found intel that there was a special Sage who could sense the location of the diamonds. The Sneaks sent their best man, The Thief, to find and kidnap this Sage. The Sage is known as The Muse. And so their story begins... 

This two player game gives you choices between two people, changing the story depending on what you pick and who you are. Still in development but there is quite a few things going on. This game should be fully completed by late December of 2020.

Game Story, Characters, Art: Prescott Lawani and Jaime Miller

Music: Martin Collazo

Created in Ren'Py.
